rComments: Disorganized, inexperience, helpless are pretty much everything about him. He didn't know how to answer students' Q's. He has trouble with technical equipments. His lecture is not only boring but repeating (from 100A, 100B). His syllabus is running loose. Worse of all, he was 30 min late for final because he FORGOT to prepare them in advance.

First impression of his face is "messy", which did reflect on his teaching styles. His class is completely disorganized: random homework given and no review guides for midterms, not to mention he was 30-min late for final cuz he forgot to print exam questions. His speech is poor and has "severe" technical difficult with machine in class. Avoid him!

I usually don't rate professors on this site, but I made an exception for this incredibly boring and unorganized professor. Homework, class, and test expectations are ambiguous at best. Don't count on him. I regret taking the class.

His class was ridiculously boring, difficult to pay attention and stay awake. Midterms were unannounced at the beginning of the quarter, and you don't find out til that week. He was not very helpful on the final paper topic and didn't give specific instructions. Avoid if you can. Take e-commerce with singh instead. Much better professor I heard.

Though I had high hopes for this class, Turnbull's lectures were mundane and hard to follow.  The text did little to help and most of the grade for the class was in turn, based off of the lectures rather than anything referenced in the book.  Generally, uninspiring and unorganized.  The material just felt like a rehash of Intermediate Micro.Oh well
